title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Long Lake Road, British Columbia
content:
Photo submitted by Ray Lampard, “Long Lake Road, near Kamloops, B.C.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Long Lake Road, British Columbia appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
